Title: Steins Gate the Movie: Load Region of Déjà vu
Director: Kanji Wakabayashi, Hiroshi Hamazaki, Takuya Satô
Writer: Chiyomaru Shikura (original story), Jukki Hanada (screenplay), J. Michael Tatum (english script adaptation), Naotaka Hayashi (scenario supervisor), Tatsuya Matsubara (scenario supervisor)
Actors: Mamoru Miyano, Asami Imai, Kana Hanazawa, Tomokazu Seki
Plot: The film starts a year after the events of the anime series. After moving through different 'World Lines', Rintarou finally has reached the ideal one, the Steins Gate world line. However, the constant time traveling he has gone through in search of Steins Gate build some side effects to him, which will eventually cause him to...
